hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Blue Rupee#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Dodongo's Cavern# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Blue Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##the Temple of Time## has #0# major items.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Ganon's Castle Boss Key# can be found in #the Market#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that ##Hyrule Castle## has #1# major item.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that plundering #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is a foolish choice.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the path of #time#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: These hints can be quite useful. This is an exception.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Kokiri Sword# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 3 Bottom

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that ##Goron City## has #0# major items.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that obtaining the #underwater silver rupees in Gerudo Training Ground# rewards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Underwater Silver Rupee Chest

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #the Minuet of Forest#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well GS West Inner Room

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find the #Lon Lon Tower#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that ##the Market## has #2# major items.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #Dodongo's Cavern#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: A broken stick is just as good as a Master Sword. Who knew?

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

LH (Lab).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Crater# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the #Desert Colossus# sands echo with #a Blue Rupee#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that plundering #inside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #a Recovery Heart# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 1 Bottom

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 4 Top

SFM (Saria).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers the #House of Twins#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #the Prelude of Light# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.
hinted_locations: LW Deku Scrub Near Deku Theater Right

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #the Bolero of Fire#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Water Temple#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that plundering #the Water Temple# is a foolish choice.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that ##the Thieves' Hideout## has #1# major item.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that the #Ice Cavern# corridors ring with #a Map of the Ice Cavern#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that on the path to the #right hand of the Spirit Temple# a chest and a spider hold...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Sun Block Room Chest
Spirit Temple GS Hall After Sun Block Room

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that the #Temple of Time# chimes with the music of #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that a room containing a #large pot in the Shadow Temple# holds...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Deku Stick#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple GS Single Giant Pot
